#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>
#include <map>
int HCF(int a,int b){
	if(b==0	)	return a;
	if(a==0)	return b;
	return HCF(b,a%b);
}
int LCM(int a,int b){
	return (a*b)/HCF(a,b);
}
int main(){
	int t,hotdog,eater;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>hotdog>>eater;
		int lcm=LCM(hotdog,eater);
		int ans=0;		
		for(int i=1;i*(lcm/eater)<lcm;i++){
			if((i*(lcm/eater))%(lcm/hotdog)==0)	continue;
			ans++;
		}
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}


return 0;	
}
